name: 陳隆建
objective:
指導學生進行研究專題，以培養其實務的能力，學生必須選一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且需有書面報告。
This course is to train students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, students have the ability to do the R/D work. Each student or group must select one research topic or one project and make a proposal or an announcement by professors' instruction.
